thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 88 of 625
thread.title: Dianne M

author: Dianne M
title: Dianne M
text: I have been very happy with Fabletics since I joined a while ago. Great quality merchandise & hassle free returns were the main reasons. The fact you are now carrying plus sizes has made me even happier. The fit of the XXL leggings & capris have been fine for me but not so much for the bras and tops. I can't wait to try on the 2 bras and the dress I ordered today. Thank you for providing us larger women with more options to enjoy!
